item.title: Boat operator involved in Clearwater Ferry crash arrested, faces multiple charges
item.description: Jeffry Knight was arrested Monday afternoon and charged with eight felonies, the FWC said.

item.description: The investigation has revealed no signs of foul play.

item.title: Booker Tornadoes begin fall camp for upcoming 2025 season
item.description: Fall camp is officially underway for the Booker High School (BHS) Tornadoes football program.

item.title: Manatee County to discuss plan to buy Mixon Fruit Farm
item.description: The 39-acre farm has been a popular tourist destination and event venue for decades.

item.description: 2 found dead behind store in Sarasota

item.title: Gunman who killed 4 at Manhattan office building was targeting NFL headquarters, mayor says
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams says that a gunman who killed four people at a Manhattan office building was trying to target the headquarters of the National Football League but took the wrong elevator.

item.title: Another day of high heat before seasonable weather returns

item.description: Authorities confirm a suspected gunman barricaded in an apartment near the University of Florida was killed.

item.title: Judge delays trial for Dima Tower, accused of murdering parents in 2023
item.description: Tower was present in the Sarasota County court but did not speak.

item.title: Former Manatee teacher faces additional charge in sexting case
item.description: An additional charge of transmitting information harmful to minors was filed July 28.
